channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dominion Energy Virginia sues over Trump order to halt offshore wind project, calling it ‘arbitrary and capricious’
item.description: Dominion called this week's order “the latest in a series of irrational agency actions attacking offshore wind and then doubling down when those actio...

item.title: Seniors relive their days of wanderlust and thrill-seeking with virtual reality. ‘It’s about all the memories that it brings back’
item.description: “We got to go underwater and didn't even have to hold our breath!” exclaimed 81-year-old Ginny Baird following the virtual submersion.

item.title: Anduril founder Palmer Luckey is among the U.S. defense execs and companies sanctioned by China over arms sales to Taiwan
item.description: The sanctions entail freezing the companies’ assets in China and banning individuals and organizations from dealing with them, according to the Chines...

item.title: U.S. launches strikes against Islamic State group in Nigeria after attacks target Christians
item.description: A Defense Department official said the U.S. worked with Nigeria to carry out the strikes and that they'd been approved by Abuja.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs actually slashed the deficit from a record $136.4 billion to less than half that. Here’s what else they did
item.description: The double-digit taxes on imports from almost every country have disrupted global commerce and strained the budgets of consumers and businesses worldw...
